title: Killers Amongst Us: Murder on the Waxworm Farm (part 2)
itunes:title: Killers Amongst Us: Murder on the Waxworm Farm (part 2)
description:
By all accounts, David and Lois Riess were a well liked couple in their Blooming Prairie, Minnesota community. When David Riess doesn't show up for work after two weeks, his employees knew something was wrong. On March 23, 2018, investigators find the body of 54-year-old David in the bathroom of his home, shot multiple times. His wife Lois is missing. Where is Lois Riess?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
